title: Create Your Own Item Competition
body:
Hey Summoners!

Be sure to enter our custom created item competition! All you have to do is design an item and get a shot at winning some prizes!

You can submit your creations by using the #SummonerSocietyMarch on Twitter or Instagram! (Or send it to our facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/summonerssociety/ )

It will end at the end of the month so you have a enough time to get your submissions in!

Good luck and have fun creating!

replies.body:
and for those who dont use facebook and twitter.

And how do you identify the winners in the game if they do win?

How are entries judged?
